verbs.description: reappropriate (third-person singular simple present reappropriates, present participle reappropriating, simple past and past participle reappropriated)

entries.meaning: (sociology) (of a group) To reclaim a term that was previously used to disparage that group.
examples: Once a term of homophobic abuse, the term “queer” has been reappropriated as a marker for some gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender (GLBT), and other marginalized sexual identities.
